title: Was LOST even a good show?
author: Drew Gooden
description:
Thanks to Squarespace for sponsoring today's video! Get 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain: https://www.squarespace.com/drew

LOST was a good show and I'm tired of pretending it wasn't. You don't have to agree with me, but you do have to watch my video.
